title: looking to join/make a team, don't care about ranks just want a team for this new game mode.
body:
alright so I'm from NSW Australia, just want to join or make a team for this up coming game mode.

I'm gold ( always ranging from g3-g1) I'm a top lane main but just as good in the jungle.
looking for people that are funny and can make the game more fun and still know how to win a game. don't want toxic people or sooks but I want people who can talk shit as mates and cop shit as well.
weekdays I can play from 5pm to 12am and weekends I can play all day. 
so add this account and I also have another account that I will tell you about when you've added this one :) lets make OCE great and dangerous
